name: THE LOST SKELD
description:
Enter the map of Skeld, which is haunted by visorless ghosts called No-Visor roaming around the map.

In this game, you play as a solo crewmate in the new maroon color.

Your job is to find these ghosts and kill every last one of them. To kill them, just tap on them or simply move your cursor towards it.

If you kill all of them you win.

If any one of them catches you, you die and immediately lose the game.

So enjoyyyyyyyyyyy THE HORROR!!!!!!!!!

Note: To open the doors press the USE button, the doors will open for 10 seconds.
